item.description:
Everyone brings either a bottle of wine or something to eat and we'll eat, drink, & be merry with our shared bounties.

Step 1: RSVP Yes to this event here

Step 2: Go here to see what others are bringing already:
CLICK HERE to see what other people are bringing already

Step 3: CLICK HERE to fill out the form to let others know what you're bringing so there is no excess duplicates

Step 4: wait for an email from Jason Deeble where he tells you exactly where he lives in Niantic

Step 5: show up and have fun.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Wine Tasting & Food Potluck @ Jason Deeble's
